flags.title: No Audit Report
flags.retail: No easily found public audit linked on Suiâ€™s website.
flags.analyst: Mysten Labs has not published formal smart contract audits on Sui Move framework. Security relies on protocol design and validator honesty.

flags.title: Early Unlock Risk
flags.retail: Large token unlocks could impact the price.
flags.analyst: SUI had over 50% of its supply allocated to insiders and early contributors. Unlock schedule raised concerns of VC-driven volatility.

flags.title: GitHub Activity
flags.retail: Looks active, but unclear how decentralized the devs are.
flags.analyst: Majority of development is led by Mysten Labs. GitHub shows solid activity but mostly from core team, not a distributed ecosystem.

flags.title: High Performance VM
flags.retail: SUI claims to be fast, cheap and scalable.
flags.analyst: Sui Move and parallel execution design offers real-time finality under ideal conditions. Performance benchmarks are promising.
